12144317381323131323.Text: NEVER! I don't CARE what she does to me. I WON'T go back. Leave me ALONE! Go AWAY!

27777314393253622461.Text: I was one of Her Hands. I served her well and faithfully. But she has changed. Once she showered her love on everyone, and it was impossible not to want to love her, to serve her, in turn. But now the only thing she loves is power -- her own power. That's all she thinks about. She doesn't notice anything else... anyone else. I don't know what happened. But I will never go back. Never.
